attributes.action: hold a ballot / refferendum of UK taxpayers on the RBS bonuses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the UK taxpayers are all shareholders and together are the largest group in RBS they should be allowed a vote as to whether to allow the payment of bonuses, reported to be near £1.5 billion.  This must be allowed as we cannot all attend the shareholders meeting to vote individually.
